CreateAlarmNotice.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: monitor.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateAlarmNotice
<Common request parameters>

{
    "Module": "monitor", 
    "Name": "noticeA", 
    "NoticeType": "ALL", 
    "NoticeLanguage": "zh-CN",
    "UserNotices": [
        {
            "ReceiverType": "USER",  
            "UserIds": [
                10001
            ], 
            "NoticeWay": [
                "SMS",
                "EMAIL"
            ], 
            "StartTime": 0, 
            "EndTime": 1, 
            "PhoneOrder": [
                10001
            ],
            "PhoneCircleInterval": 60, 
            "PhoneCircleTimes": 2, 
            "PhoneInnerInterval": 60,
            "NeedPhoneArriveNotice": 1
        }
    ], 
    "URLNotices": [
        {
            "URL": "https://www.mytest.com/validate"
        }
    ]
}
CreateAlarmNotice.title: Creating notification template

CreateAlarmPolicy.document: This example shows you how to bind two notification rules and one auto scaling policy where the policy type is "CVM - basic monitoring", triggering metric is "CPU utilization >= 99.9%", and triggering event is "unreachable by ping".
CreateAlarmPolicy.title: Creating alarm policy

DescribeStatisticData.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: monitor.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: DescribeStatisticData
<Common request parameters>

{
  "Module": "monitor",
  "Namespace": "QCE/TKE",
  "MetricNames": [
    "K8sPodCpuCoreUsed"
  ],
  "Period": 300,
  "Conditions": [
    {
      "Key": "tke_cluster_instance_id",
      "Operator": "=",
      "Value": [
        "cls-mw2w40s7"
      ]
    }
  ],
  "StartTime": "2020-11-24T15:15:50+08:00",
  "EndTime": "2020-11-24T15:25:50+08:00"
}
DescribeStatisticData.title: Querying monitoring data by dimension condition

GetMonitorData.document: This example shows you how to get the 5-minute CPU utilization monitoring data of one CVM instance in a certain period of time.
GetMonitorData.title: Getting the monitoring data of one CVM instance

GetMonitorData.document: This example shows you how to get the 5-minute CPU utilization monitoring data of multiple CVM instances in a certain period of time.
GetMonitorData.title: Getting the monitoring data of multiple CVM instances

GetMonitorData.document: This example shows you how to get the 5-minute CPU utilization monitoring data of one TencentDB instance in a certain period of time.
GetMonitorData.title: Getting the monitoring data of one TencentDB instance

ModifyAlarmNotice.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: monitor.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: ModifyAlarmNotice
<Common request parameters>

{
    "Module":"monitor",
    "NoticeId":"notice-2gf892hg",
    "Name":"noticeAAA",
    "NoticeType":"ALL",
    "NoticeLanguage":"zh-CN",
    "UserNotices":[
        {
            "ReceiverType":"USER",
            "UserIds":[
                10001
            ],
            "NoticeWay":[
                "SMS",
                "EMAIL"
            ],
            "StartTime":0,
            "EndTime":1,
            "PhoneOrder":[
                10001
            ],
            "PhoneCircleInterval":60,
            "PhoneCircleTimes":2,
            "PhoneInnerInterval":60,
            "NeedPhoneArriveNotice":1
        }
    ],
    "URLNotices":[
        {
            "URL":"http://www.test.com"
        }
    ]
}
ModifyAlarmNotice.title: Modifying notification template

ModifyAlarmPolicyCondition.title: Editing the trigger condition of alarm policy

ModifyAlarmPolicyInfo.document: This example shows you how to rename the `policy-298gn92` alarm policy "New CVM alarm policy".
ModifyAlarmPolicyInfo.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: monitor.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: ModifyAlarmPolicyInfo
<Common request parameters>

{
  "Module": "monitor",
  "PolicyId": "policy-298gn92",
  "Key": "NAME",
  "Value": "New CVM alarm policy"
}
ModifyAlarmPolicyInfo.title: Editing the basic information of alarm policy

ModifyAlarmPolicyNotice.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: monitor.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: ModifyAlarmPolicyNotice
<Common request parameters>

{
    "Module":"monitor",
    "PolicyId":"policy-asgh3gb2",
    "NoticeIds":[
        "notice-bv9b4ghqbg",
        "notice-gj2n9wnt29"
    ]
}
ModifyAlarmPolicyNotice.title: Modifying alarm notification template bound to alarm policy

ModifyAlarmPolicyStatus.document: This example shows you how to disable a policy.
ModifyAlarmPolicyStatus.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: monitor.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: ModifyAlarmPolicyStatus
<Common request parameters>

{
  "Module": "monitor",
  "PolicyId": "policy-2g22g82",
  "Enable": 0
}
ModifyAlarmPolicyStatus.title: Modifying alarm policy status

ModifyAlarmPolicyTasks.title: Modifying task triggered by alarm policy
